title: NPE in BoostedQuery.hashCode() submitting "({!boost b=1} *:*)" query
description:
Using example configuration included in solr distribution submitting 

({!boost b=1} *:*)

 or 

{!boost b=1}

 as q parameter results in a NPE.

Submitting the same query without a space doesn't 

({!boost b=1}*:*)

Maybe a little bug in query parser?
